title: FREEZE_ENTITY_POSITION
content:
0x428CA6DBD10944460x65C16D57// FreezeEntityPosition
void FREEZE_ENTITY_POSITION(Entity entity, BOOL toggle);Parameters:entity: The entity to freeze/unfreeze.toggle: Freeze or unfreeze entity.Freezes or unfreezes an entity preventing its coordinates to change by the player if set to true. You can still change the entity position using SET_ENTITY_COORDS.Examples:LuaJavaScriptC#-- Freeze the local player.

-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId() 

-- Freeze the ped
FreezeEntityPosition(playerPed, true)
codeBlocks:
// FreezeEntityPosition
void FREEZE_ENTITY_POSITION(Entity entity, BOOL toggle);

-- Freeze the local player.

-- Retrieve the player ped
local playerPed = PlayerPedId() 

-- Freeze the ped
FreezeEntityPosition(playerPed, true)
